sentences.sContent: Such as harelip and heart can check out first?
sentences.sContent_eng: Such as harelip and heart can check out first?
sentences.sCn: 比如兔唇和先心能否检查出来？

sentences.sContent: Why does a baby suffer a harelip ? Is there any prevention?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why does a baby suffer a harelip ? Is there any prevention?
sentences.sCn: 兔唇宝宝是怎样造成的，能有效预防吗？

sentences.sContent: In walks this man -- short, ugly, balding, and speaking with a strange harelip.
sentences.sContent_eng: In walks this man -- short, ugly, balding, and speaking with a strange harelip.
sentences.sCn: 那个人走进来——又矮，又丑，还秃顶，嘴上带着奇怪的唇裂。

trans.tranOther: an offensive word for the condition of having your top lip divided into two parts because it did not develop correctly before birth
